[50-59] The scene switches to an indoor setting. The man, dressed in a red Santa Claus costume, is holding a bottle of cola and trying to fit a green balloon over the opening, with a smile on his face. The gas from the cola starts to fill the balloon, causing it to gradually inflate and expand. When the balloon inflates to a certain size, the cola suddenly erupts from the bottle, spraying the man's face. He closes his eyes and tilts his head back.
